translations: n．敌意，仇恨：对某人或某事持有强烈的不友好或敌对情绪。
· The two countries have a long history of enmities.
这两个国家有着长期的敌对关系。

sentences.sentence: We must blot out the personal enmities at this time.
sentences.translation: 此时我们必须摒弃个人之间的恩怨。

sentences.sentence: Yes, enmities going back to medieval times can be healed.
sentences.translation: 是的，源自中世纪的敌意可以愈合。

sentences.sentence: Outside of Libya, Gaddafi will be remembered for his enmities.
sentences.translation: 在利比亚之外，卡扎菲被所有的政敌铭记在心。
